synopsis.text: Shinbun newspaper, a century-old establishment, embarks on an ambitious project to commemorate its 100th anniversary: the creation of the "Ultimate Menu." This special edition aims to transcend mere food descriptions, aspiring to encapsulate the world's finest culinary delights and preserve dietary wisdom for future generations. In a surprising turn of events, the responsibility of curating this monumental work falls on the shoulders of an unlikely duo: the apathetic food critic, Yamaoka Shiro, and the eager yet inexperienced newcomer, Kurita Yuko. Despite the skepticism surrounding Yamaoka's lackluster work ethic, the pair sets out on a global culinary adventure to craft the Ultimate Menu, leaving readers eager to witness the outcome of this gastronomic quest.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
